QuestData.Title: A Fresh Blade
QuestData.Description:
Though they were once unified in defending the Shadowlands, the houses of Maldraxxus have turned against each other.
Their armies clash within their realm and have even orchestrated an assault on Bastion. Now only the Necrolords remain loyal to the Primus.
Speak to Secutor Mevix at the Seat of the Primus in Maldraxxus. His tactical skills will ensure you are sent where you are most needed.
Pathscribe Roh-Avonavi in the Ring of Transference above can provide you with transportation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Secutor Mevix at the Seat of the Primus in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Secutor Mevix at the Seat of the Primus in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, another blade on our side! And you aren't even dead yet!
